bibl.title: ""A Dwelling Place of Christ, A Healing Place of Knowledge"": The Non-Chalcedonian Eucharist in Late Antique Egypt and Its Setting.
Varieties of Devotion in the Middle Ages and Renaissance

bibl.seg: Leslie S.B. MacCoull, ""A Dwelling Place of Christ, A Healing Place of Knowledge"": The Non-Chalcedonian Eucharist in Late Antique Egypt and Its Setting.
Susan C. Karant-Nunn (ed.), Varieties of Devotion in the Middle Ages and Renaissance = Arizona Studies in the Middle Ages and the Renaissance. 7 (Turnhout, 2003) pp. 1-16.
